tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FishPopulationHealth (
   population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   species VARCHAR(255),
   population_size INT,
   average_weight DECIMAL,
   health_status VARCHAR(50),
   disease_diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
   treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FishHealthRecord (
    fish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fish_species VARCHAR(255),
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    disease VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WaterQualityRecord (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_date DATE,
    ammonia_level FLOAT,
    ph_level FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    dissolved_oxygen FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE FishPopulations (
    fish_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species TEXT NOT NULL,
    location TEXT NOT NULL,
    population_size INT NOT NULL,
    health_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseRecords (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    fish_id INT REFERENCES FishPopulations(fish_id),
    disease_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_id INT REFERENCES DiseaseRecords(record_id),
    treatment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    treatment_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    treatment_success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id UUID REFERENCES FishSpecies(species_id),
    health_status BOOLEAN,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    water_quality VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
